column4: I'm looking for a tool to help manage my downloads (mostly for setting speed limits)... I'd prefer it outside of firefox (since firefox occasionally crashes)... command line would be best... anyone know of any good ones?  I like wget, but it won't let me adjust download speeds once I start... or set global download limits
If I start "screen" with trickle limits... will all the wget commands within that screen be subject to those limits?
